description: Yorito finally decides to introduce Matsuri to Aono under the guise of her being his new girlfriend, but when they visit Aono the latter feigns sleep. Later on, Aono meets with Matsuri in a tram depot; both return to Aono`s home together as the onee-san has permission from the hospital to stay at home for now. After dinner Yorito shows Matsuri his classroom at school and the roof where he used to make pictures of the sky, and then the girl suddenly kisses Yorito - and disappears.
